desc: Welcome to BorsheimArts.com Artist Kelly Borsheim creates figurative stone sculpture (often marble art), bronze statues, paintings, drawings, and murals, generally realism. Guest artists include Ukrainian Vasily Fedorouk, Serbian Dragana Adamov, Japanese Kumiko Suzuki. Choose home, garden, office decor fine art book

layout.text: I create stone sculpture, bronze statues, paintings, drawings, and murals.  Enjoy my Guest Artists: Vasily Fedorouk, Dragana Adamov, and Kumiko Suzuki. Have a look around and choose something to enhance your life. Happy shopping, Kelly
